## mergeConfig() function

Merges the provided options into the existing global Yoot configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mergeConfig: (options: YootConfig) => void
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options

</td><td>

[YootConfig](./yoot.yootconfig.md)

</td><td>

Configuration options to merge.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Properties in the provided `options` will overwrite existing ones if keys match.
